author: Epic Games
description:
Your team. Your season. Your Rematch.

Step onto the pitch like never before in Rematch Season 1. Kicking off September 23, this season brings crossplay, competitive 3v3 ranked play, and a Season Pass packed with cosmetics, arenas, and more. 

Available now on the Epic Games Store! Get it 20% off until October 7. https://epic.gm/rematch


HIGHLIGHTS
Crossplay – no limits, no barriers. Play with friends on any platform, anytime. Your squad all in one place.
3v3 Ranked –  bring on your two best mates and climb the ladder with your team, prove your skill, and earn bragging rights.
Season Pass – take your game somewhere new. Unlock the frozen cliffs of Iceberg and the molten chaos of Volcano, plus fresh cosmetics to flex your style.
Your season starts now. See you on the pitch. 
⚽
title: Rematch | Season 1 Trailer
